00030 #import <Foundation/Foundation.h>
00031 #include "pcre.h"
00032 
00033 enum
00034 {
00035  // hard coded into match logic
00036  //quUTF8 = PCRE_UTF8, // match time only
00037  
00038     // ignore case in match
00039  quICASE = PCRE_CASELESS, // compile time only
00040  
00041     // if not set, treat '\n' as an ordinary character
00042  quNEWLINE = PCRE_MULTILINE, // compile time only
00043  
00044     // '^' doesn't match at the start of line
00045  quNOTBOL = PCRE_NOTBOL, // match time only
00046  
00047     // '$' doesn't match at the end of line
00048  quNOTEOL = PCRE_NOTEOL // match time only
00049 };
00050 
00054 @interface ObjPCRE : NSObject
00055 {
00056  @private
00057  pcre * mRegex; // current pcre object
00058  const char * mLastError; // description of the last error
00059  int mLastErrorOffset; // last error offset
00060  int mMaxVectorSize; // match capacity size of vector
00061  int * mVector; // holds vector array of matches
00062  int mVectorCount; // passed to pcre_exec (used to create mVector) 
00063  int mExecOptions; // the pcre_exec options
00064  int mCompileOptions; // the pcre_compile options
00065  
00070  int mMatchCount;
00071 }
